name: 卡罗琳娜·波佐
name_full: 卡罗琳娜·波佐 Carolina Pozo
introduction: Carolina Pozo, also known as Caro, is a Miami, Fl native. First generation Cuban - American, daughter to parents Justo and Sylvia Pozo. She attended Florida International University where she received her 'Bachelors of Fine Arts in Theatre' and spent her summers in New York City training at NYU's Tisch School of the Arts for Musical theatre CAP 21 and New York Film Academy.Fun Facts: Her late paternal grandfather, Luis Pozo, was the former senator of Havana, Cuba and great grandfather, Justo Luis Pozo, was the mayor of Havana,Cuba (pre- communist government).
